member.name: ICredentialProviderCredentialEvents2.BeginFieldUpdates
member.summary: Starts a batch update to fields in the logon or credential UI.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICredentialProviderCredentialEvents2.EndFieldUpdates
member.summary: Finishes and commits the batch updates started by .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICredentialProviderCredentialEvents2.SetFieldOptions
member.summary: Specifies whether a specified field in the logon or credential UI should display a "password reveal" glyph or is expected to receive an e-mail address.
member.param: An interface pointer to the credential object.
The ID of the field in the logon or credential UI for which this option applies.
One or more of the values, which specify the field options.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICredentialProviderCredentialEvents2
member.summary: Extends the interface by adding methods that enable batch updating of fields in theLogon UI or Credential UI.
